Module tasuya4lc.inventorysystem
Package tatsuya4lc.inventorysystem

Class MainApplication

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
tatsuya4lc.inventorysystem.MainApplication
public class MainApplication extends javafx.application.Application
This is the MainApplication class that creates the inventory management system application.

FUTURE ENHANCEMENT

1) Context Menu: enable user to interact with the fields in the TableView.
i.e. rename, copy, paste

2) Dialog that informs user part object is already associated.

3) Dialog that confirms to proceed with the deletion even though associated parts exist.
This deletion would also remove the associated part from the product.

4) Search function needs to accommodate for number in name and show both matched id and matched partial name.
This is to prevent a logical error when product/part name consist of a number that is also the same value as the ID.

Author:
Tristan Lozano

    • changeMenu

      public static void changeMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, int x, int y, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> table1, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Product> table2)
      This is the changeMenu method. This method changes scene when called.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent parameter used get the window for the stage
      x - leveraged to pick a fxml file for FXMLLoader to set scene
      y - leveraged to allow calling methods from another controller
      table1 - TableView parameter for modifying the Part Table
      table2 - TableView parameter for modifying the Product Table
